name: aurora-rise-desktop
description: Aurora Rise Desktop Application - Platform for managing training sessions

scripts.build-desktop: npm run setup && npm run build && cd electron && npm run build-win
scripts.build-desktop-mac: npm run setup && npm run build && cd electron && npm run build-mac
scripts.build-desktop-all: npm run setup && npm run build && cd electron && npm run build-all
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install
scripts.package: npm run build-desktop && npm run copy-installer
scripts.package-mac: npm run build-desktop-mac && npm run copy-installer
scripts.package-all: npm run build-desktop-all && npm run copy-installer

author: Aurora Rise Team
